kzchatbot-rag-settings-section-general: Header for the general settings section in the LLM configuration interface
kzchatbot-rag-settings-section-model: Header for the AI model configuration section in the LLM settings
kzchatbot-rag-settings-section-prompts: Header for the section containing prompt configuration settings
kzchatbot-rag-settings-section-restricti: Header for the section containing restriction and filtering settings
kzchatbot-rag-settings-label-model: Label for the dropdown menu where users select an AI model. Models include options like GPT-3.5 and GPT-4
kzchatbot-rag-settings-help-model: Help text explaining the model selection dropdown. Describes that this setting determines which AI model will process the content
kzchatbot-rag-settings-label-num-of-page: Label for the numeric input field where users specify how many pages to process
kzchatbot-rag-settings-help-num-of-pages: Help text explaining the page number selector. Describes that this setting limits how many pages the AI will process at once
kzchatbot-rag-settings-label-temperature: Label for the temperature setting dropdown. Temperature affects AI response randomness
kzchatbot-rag-settings-help-temperature: Help text explaining the temperature setting. Describes how temperature affects the randomness/creativity of AI responses (0.1-0.9)
kzchatbot-rag-settings-label-system-prom: Label for the system prompt text input field. System prompts set base behavior
kzchatbot-rag-settings-help-system-promp: Help text explaining the system prompt field. Describes that system prompts are instructions that define the AI's base behavior and capabilities
kzchatbot-rag-settings-label-user-prompt: Label for the user prompt text input field. User prompts guide specific responses
kzchatbot-rag-settings-help-user-prompt: Help text explaining the user prompt field. Describes that user prompts are instructions for specific tasks or response patterns
kzchatbot-rag-settings-label-banned-fiel: Label for the text input where users can specify fields to be filtered out
kzchatbot-rag-settings-help-banned-field: Help text explaining the banned fields input. Describes that users should enter comma-separated field names to be excluded from processing
